fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Steal something from someone each night.
- Choose to use an ability you stole.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target has any charges of a limited use ability, you will steal the charge. If they have multiple abilities with a charge left, you will take the first ability listed on the role card with a charge.
- You may choose to use any charges that you have taken, but you may not steal and use a charge at night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Steal three charges from other players.
